metadata.title: CVE-2023-52683 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ACPI: LPIT: Avoid u32 multiplication overflowIn lpit_update_residency() there is a possibility of overflowin multiplication, if tsc_khz is large enough (> UINT_MAX/1000).Change multiplication to mul_u32_u32().Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
